metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14767 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: In Kamailio before 5.0.7 and 5.1.x before 5.1.4, a crafted SIP message with a double "To" header and an empty "To" tag causes a segmentation fault and crash. The reason is missing input validation in the "build_res_buf_from_sip_req" core function. This could result in denial of service and potentially the execution of arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: kamailio package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.1-1').
